commits.message:
Fix the on / trigger interface for adding custom events.

When an event is triggered on a record a method with the same name is invoked.
Existence of this method should be confirmed before invocation.

Merge pull request #344 from bestie/fix-custom-event-listeners

Fix the on / trigger interface for adding custom events.
Call pushState when state null and at initial url
Adding test for pushState when at initialURL

Merge pull request #1220 from digitaltoad/bug/fix_push_state_back_button

Call pushState when state null and at initial url
Added support for uploading docs to multiple locations
added first version of my theme af-magic
theme cleanup

Remove bogus "-" from nomz="ps -aux" alias.

Info from http://procps.sourceforge.net/faq.html .
escape whitespace
utilize sublime's embedded command line binary

Merge pull request #1216 from joshvermaire/patch-1

Escape whitespace for Sublime Text plugin

Merge pull request #1206 from Eustachy/upstream

Remove bogus "-" from nomz="ps -aux" alias.

Merge pull request #1200 from andyfleming/master

New theme af-magic.zsh-theme
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh

'rails' command should not be run with bundle exec

http://blog.wyeworks.com/2011/12/27/bundle-exec-rails-executes-bundler-setup-3-times
http://yehudakatz.com/2011/05/30/gem-versioning-and-bundler-doing-it-right/
auto-upadate feature will now reset the epoch so that if a user doesn't say yes, it won't ask them again for a while. fixes #1240
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh

Merge pull request #1229 from seban/run_rails_without_bundle_exec

'rails' command should not be run with bundle exec
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh
Add more cd utilities and add Z functionality

issue.title: pushing problem
issue.body:
Hi. When I try push a couchapp via this Netbeans plugin I will get following exception:

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1
	at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1952)
	at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1925)
	at org.pangratz.netbeans.couchapp.RuntimeCouchAppUtil.pushCouchApp(RuntimeCouchAppUtil.java:132)

	at org.pangratz.netbeans.couchapp.actions.AbstractGenerateAction.actionPerformed(AbstractGenerateAction.java:41)
	at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2018)
	at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2341)
	at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.fireActionPerformed(DefaultButtonModel.java:402)
	at javax.swing.DefaultButtonModel.setPressed(DefaultButtonModel.java:259)
	at javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicButtonListener.mouseReleased(BasicButtonListener.java:252)
	at java.awt.AWTEventMulticaster.mouseReleased(AWTEventMulticaster.java:290)
	at java.awt.AWTEventMulticaster.mouseReleased(AWTEventMulticaster.java:289)
	at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Component.java:6505)
	at javax.swing.JComponent.processMouseEvent(JComponent.java:3312)
	at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Component.java:6270)
	at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Container.java:2229)
	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:4861)
	at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2287)
	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4687)
	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent(Container.java:4832)
	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Container.java:4492)
	at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Container.java:4422)
	at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:2273)
	at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:2719)
	at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:4687)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:703)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.access$000(EventQueue.java:102)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:662)
	at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:660)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:76)

	at java.awt.EventQueue$4.run(EventQueue.java:674)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:76)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:673)
	at org.netbeans.core.TimableEventQueue.dispatchEvent(TimableEventQueue.java:158)
[catch] at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:244)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:163)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThread.java:151)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:147)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:139)
	at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:97)

comment.body:
Ok, I'll have a look at it and post the updates here.

Thanks for your feedback!! :v:

commits.message: add failing test

comment.body: Okay, thanks. I'll try to free some time to look at it. In the meantime, would it be possible to test it with a push to a database which doesn't need authentication? I have a feeling that this might be the issue here ...
